definition: a burn (tissue damage from heat, chemicals etc)/to burn (the skin etc)/(fig.) (of anger, jealousy etc) to hurt (sb)

sentences.english: skin exposure due to severe burns after the period.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤由于经过暴晒严重灼伤时期。

sentences.english: People usually wear sunglasses to protect their eyes from being burned by the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 人们通常戴太阳镜以妨眼睛被太阳灼伤。

sentences.english: Simon sustained 40% external burns, and also burnt his oesophagus and both lungs.
sentences.chinese: 车辆起火，他外表40%烧伤，食道及肺部皆灼伤。

sentences.english: A welder wears goggles to protect his eyes from being burned.
sentences.chinese: 电焊工戴着护目镜防止眼睛被灼伤。

sentences.english: Sunburns are the result of too much direct sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 灼伤，是由于太多的阳光直接照射。

sentences.english: Diagnostic criteria and principles of management of occupational chemical eye burns.
sentences.chinese: 职业性化学性眼灼伤诊断标准及处理原则。

sentences.english: Remove jewellery etc. and cover the burn as detailed above.
sentences.chinese: 去除珠宝等并且按照上述详细说明包扎灼伤处。

sentences.english: Pouring cold water on skin burns can provide temporary relief.
sentences.chinese: 在灼伤的皮肤上浇冷水可暂时止疼。

sentences.english: Till beam appeared to bloom, and flower to burn.
sentences.chinese: 直待到阳光照你开花，花儿灼伤。

sentences.english: Australians are very skin conscious and protect themselves from the fierce sun.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲人很注意呵护皮肤，保护自己免受太阳灼伤。

sentences.english: Skin biopsies have determined that many whales are now suffering from severe sunburns.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤活检印证了很多鲸鱼在遭受日晒灼伤。

sentences.english: Dirges so melancholic that they would scorch you.
sentences.chinese: 挽歌非常忧沉，会将你灼伤。

sentences.english: How to alleviate quickly is the skin felt by the ache with burnable sun?
sentences.chinese: 怎样快速缓解皮肤被太阳灼伤的疼痛感？

sentences.english: They also used it for sunburns and to retard the aging process.
sentences.chinese: 他们还用它来防治日光灼伤，以及延缓衰老过程。

sentences.english: UVB rays can burn your skin.
Can help to reduce the appearance of minor burns, skin abrasions and rashes.
sentences.chinese: 能够缓解轻度表皮灼伤，皮肤擦伤和皮肤疹。

definition: stab of pain/sting/fig. stimulus to action/a prick
to damage by scratching/to gash/to lacerate
